biocontainers.name: seqan-dev
biocontainers.summary: An open source c++ library of efficient algorithms and data structures for the analysis of sequences with the focus on biological data. our library applies a unique generic design that guarantees high performance, generality, extensibility, and integration with other libraries. the library is easy to use and simplifies the development of new software tools with a minimal loss of performance. additionally, it includes several ready-made command line tools for common tasks in sequence analysis.
